translation.en: Five years ago, he was our top agent.
translation.zh: 五年前 他是我们最好的特工

translation.en: Took his eye off the ball in Mozambique.
translation.zh: 要不是他在莫桑比克惹了麻烦

translation.en: Does it have to be him?
He's the only one our contact will talk to.
You came here to forget your life of shame.
translation.zh: （西藏群山） 你来这儿是为了抛开耻辱的过往

translation.en: But the path you must tread... to new life...
will be not be easy, English.
translation.zh: 实非易事 英格力士

translation.en: Mind... must be master of the body.
Strong mind can separate the body...
translation.zh: 顽强的意志 何惧上刀山下火海
集中精神 英格力士

translation.en: Sorry? [ GASPS ] Hot! Hot! Hot, hot!
When mind is master of the body,
translation.zh: 如果意志能控制好身体

translation.en: you will be warrior once more.
I'm in touch with a higher power.
on the first flight back to London.

translation.zh: 大师 我准备好了吗？

translation.en: [ WOMAN ] One moment, please. Good morning, sir.
translation.zh: 请稍等 先生 早上好

translation.en: To speak to an agent, press two.
translation.zh: 连线特工请按二 （东芝英国情报局 您的专属情报局）
（东芝英国情报局 您的专属情报局） 当然 先生 麻烦您重新输入我们的网址

translation.en: Can I redirect you to our Web site--
translation.zh: 当然 先生 麻烦您重新输入我们的网址

translation.en: - Good morning, sir. Can I help you? - Johnny English.
translation.zh: 先生 早上好 有什么能帮助您的？ 约翰尼英格力士
帕姆拉桑顿 军情七处的总管

translation.en: You've been away for some time, English.
translation.zh: 你走了有一段时间了 英格力士

translation.en: But you haven't been forgotten. Hmm.
People here often talk about your adventures in Mozambique.
translation.zh: 这里还常说起你在莫桑比克的冒险

translation.en: Well, MI7 has come a long way since then.
translation.zh: 军情七处从你走后又进步了许多

translation.en: The guns, the fast cars and the chauvinism are all on their way out.
translation.zh: 什么枪战 飞车 沙文主义那一套 都过时了

translation.en: Frankly, I didn't want to see you back.
translation.zh: 坦白说 我不乐意看到你回来

translation.en: You are everything I came into this service to change.
translation.zh: 你就是我要改革的东西

translation.en: But my hands are tied-- [ YOWLS ]
translation.zh: 你就是我要改革的东西 可惜这事我做不了主

translation.en: and there are times when one has to go against one's better judgment.
translation.zh: 总有些时候 人会很明智的选择背道而驰

translation.en: There's a good puss. There's a good puss.
translation.zh: 这有只乖猫咪 有只乖猫咪

translation.en: There's a good pussy. Who's a good pussy?
translation.zh: 这有只乖猫咪 谁是乖猫咪呀？

translation.en: I'm impressed. Who's a good pussy?
Philby never lets strangers pick him up.
translation.zh: 菲白从不让陌生人抱它

translation.en: Oh, I'm very much at one with the animal kingdom.
translation.zh: 在动物世界里 我总能获得特权

translation.en: Meow. There's a good puss. [ PURRING ]
I know, I know. Who's lovely? Who's lovely?
translation.zh: 我知道 谁是小可爱 小可爱是谁
凯特萨姆纳 行为治疗师

translation.en: I've heard a great deal about you. Glowing reports, I trust.
translation.zh: 久仰您的大名 想必都是盛赞
跟我说说 萨姆纳女士

translation.en: what exactly does a behavioral psychologist do?
translation.zh: 行为治疗师的工作是什么？

translation.en: Monitor observable behavior for signs of internal psychology.
translation.zh: 观察深层心理的外在表象

translation.en: Well, we must get together sometime.
I think you'll find me a real page-turner.
translation.zh: 你肯定会觉得我是本好书
帕加索斯 说说现况吧

translation.en: Ex-C.I.A. agent Titus Fisher has contacted us from Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 前中情局特工提图斯费舍尔 从香港联系我们

translation.en: He has intelligence of a plot to assassinate the Chinese premier...
translation.zh: 他的情报显示 有人要在下周的中英会谈时

translation.en: at the Anglo-Chinese talks next week.
We need you to go and find out what he's got.
translation.zh: 需要你去弄清他确切的情报内容

translation.en: Well, in that case, Pegasus, count me in.
translation.zh: 既然如此 帕加索斯 我去

translation.en: Agent One will meet you downstairs.
translation.zh: 一号特工会在楼下见你

translation.en: So, I just scaled the walls, blew the whole place to kingdom come.
translation.zh: 结果 我就爬上墙头 把那鬼地方炸成平地

translation.en: An hour later, I'm sitting in the bar with a White Russian in my hand.
translation.zh: 一小时后 我已经手拿鸡尾酒坐在酒吧里

translation.en: Who was very lovely, too, I can tell you. [ PEOPLE LAUGHING ]
translation.zh: 跟你们说 那也是相当惬意
西蒙 春风得意啊 不过你一向如此

translation.en: But then you always did. Welcome back. How long has it been?
translation.zh: 春风得意啊 不过你一向如此 欢迎回来 你走了多久？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. Five years, three months and six days, or something.
translation.zh: 不知道 五年三个月又六天 左右吧

translation.en: That was a balls-up with a cherry on top.
Come on. Let's get you sorted.
translation.zh: 快来 给你打扮打扮

translation.en: I won't leave you my number.
- You know Patch? - Patch Quartermain, the man himself.
translation.zh: 你知道帕奇 帕奇柯特蒙就是他
帕奇柯特蒙就是他 英格力士 不用起来
不用起来 想起也起不来

translation.en: [ CLANGING ] Lost them testing the B-6 exploding brogues.
Oh, I'm so sorry. How are you?
Have to be this one, I'm afraid.
Lost this to the D-10 doorbell. [ CHORTLES ]
Ah. Well, it's great to see... what's left of you.
[ LAUGHS ] This is rather good fun, actually.
and I've, uh, managed to add the odd thing.
This way. I haven't got all day.
translation.zh: 这边 我可没时间耗
别瞎捣乱好吧 英格力士

translation.en: Here she is. Ah. The Rolls-Royce Phantom.
translation.zh: 她在这呢 劳斯莱斯幻影
应该说劳斯莱斯自动版

translation.en: Armor plating, all the bells and whistles.
translation.zh: 应该说劳斯莱斯自动版 装甲钢板 还有好多小玩意儿
装甲钢板 还有好多小玩意儿 说句“发动”
语音激活只会识别你的声音

translation.en: Rolls has fitted one of their experimental engines,
translation.zh: 劳斯莱斯提供了一个实验引擎

translation.en: the nine-liter V16. Goes like the wind--
translation.zh: 九公升的V16 车速如风

translation.en: Here's what you'll be taking to Hong Kong.
translation.zh: 这些是你去香港的装备
-要来了 -卫星接收器 跟踪装置 塑料炸弹口香糖
跟踪装置 塑料炸弹口香糖

translation.en: - Now, what did I just say? - [ WHIRRING ]
That's the new P-2 digital dart gun.

translation.zh: 先生们 友情提醒一下

translation.en: May I remind you all that MI7's current weapon of choice is dialogue?
translation.zh: 先生们 友情提醒一下 军情七处最新精配武器纯属扯淡

translation.en: We do love it when you get strict, Pegasus.
translation.zh: 我们最喜欢你严肃的样子 帕加索斯

translation.en: English, you go to Hong Kong tonight.
translation.zh: 英格力士 你今晚去香港
英格力士 你今晚去香港 费舍尔会联系你

translation.en: It will be an honor, sir.
Well, it'll be good to have somebody to carry the bags.
translation.zh: 有人帮忙提行李很不错

translation.en: You made a laughingstock out of this service once, English.
translation.zh: 你以前可闹出过笑话 英格力士
别给我添乱 明白吗？
完全明白 帕加索斯

translation.en: Just like old times, eh, Johnny?
translation.zh: 和当年一样吧 约翰尼

translation.en: I'm off to Switzerland. Let's catch up when you get back.
translation.zh: 我要去瑞士 等你回来再说

translation.en: [ HIGH VOICE ] There's nothing I'd like more, Simon.
Anyone seen the voice-changing travel lozenges?
translation.zh: 有人看到变声旅游喉糖吗？

translation.en: I'm not 21 until September, sir. I'm not really allowed in.
translation.zh: 九月我才满二十一岁 不可以进去

translation.en: Tucker, you're an agent working for Her Majesty's Secret Service.
translation.zh: 塔克 你可是女王特勤局的特工呀
换一万美元筹码 宝贝

translation.en: We're looking for a Chinese man in spectacles.
translation.zh: 要找戴眼镜的中国人 再来一杯吗 先生？

translation.en: Sir. The Chinese man in spectacles.
translation.zh: 长官 戴眼镜的中国人

translation.en: Well, she's dead. That's how sick she is.
translation.zh: 她真病得不轻 死很久了

translation.en: No, no, no. Nothing's the matter. Colin.
translation.zh: 没没没 没什么大事

translation.en: Well, I felt a bit funny last night, but I'm okay now.
translation.zh: 昨晚有点不舒服 现在没事了

translation.en: So, what have you got for us?
The people behind the plot to kill Xiang Ping, the Chinese premier--
translation.zh: 幕后黑手要杀中国总理向平

translation.en: - Never heard of them. - Paid assassins.
translation.zh: 没听过 行内一流的雇佣刺客

translation.en: Come on, Fisher. I need names. I need evidence.
translation.zh: 拜托 费舍尔 我要的是名字 是证据

translation.en: This is one of three keys that, when used together, gain access to it.
translation.zh: 拿到它需要集齐三把钥匙 我手上有一把
没了这钥匙 旋风组就完了

translation.en: How did you get hold of it?
- I beg your pardon? - Vortex is three of us.
translation.zh: 什么？ 我们是旋风三人组

translation.en: Come off it, Fisher. You, a hired assassin?
translation.zh: 别吹了 费舍尔 你是雇佣杀手吗？

translation.en: You couldn't hit a barn door with a banana.
clearly you got the name off a box of washing powder.
translation.zh: 这词肯定是从洗衣粉盒上看到的
旋风组当时也在莫桑比克

translation.en: Mum-- Mum, I've got to go. Gotta--
translation.zh: 妈 我得挂了 挂了

translation.en: - We were all there that day, Johnny Boy. - Excuse me!
translation.zh: 那一整天我们都在呢 小约翰尼 -打扰了 长官 -什么？

translation.en: - Sir, there's a-- - Quick! Come on!
translation.zh: 长官 我发现… 快点 快

translation.en: Madam, let me help you with that. Here, yes.
translation.zh: 女士 我来帮你提 来 对 我想你该离开这里

translation.en: I think you should vacate the area.
translation.zh: 来 对 我想你该离开这里

translation.en: There are some very dangerous people about.
Get after her, Tucker! Get after her!
translation.zh: 抓住她 塔克 抓住她
长官 这里 塔克

translation.en: - I lost her, sir. - Look what I found.
translation.zh: 跟丢了 长官 看我找到了什么？
这里 长官 这里

translation.en: You get down to the street. I'll take the roof.
translation.zh: 你到街上去 我到楼顶去

translation.en: [ TIBETAN TEACHER'S VOICE ] You are not young. But with age comes wisdom.
translation.zh: 你虽青春不再 但姜还是老的辣

translation.en: [ TRIGGER COCKS ] Hand it over, chimp.
I'm commandeering this vessel in the name of Her Majesty.
translation.zh: 我以女王的名义征用这艘船
遵命 长官 太刺激了

translation.en: Now, what's your poison? Can I get you something?
translation.zh: 喜欢喝点什么 我给您拿
喜欢喝点什么 我给您拿 有伏特加和朗姆酒
你们的安全是我们的首要任务

translation.en: But you can help us by familiarizing yourself with this leaflet.
translation.zh: 想更好地配合我们的工作 请看这份传单

translation.en: Crème de menthe, a smidgen of port,
translation.zh: 薄荷甜酒 一点波尔图葡萄酒

translation.en: and that's about it, I'm afraid.

translation.zh: 我是雪莉 你好 雪莉

translation.en: Just a tad to your left, Shirley.
translation.zh: 往左一点 雪莉 谢谢
往左一点 雪莉 谢谢 （目标锁定）

translation.en: - [ SHIRLEY LAUGHING ] Ah, yes! - Well played, sir! Just like a gladiator!
- More champagne, my lovely? - Certainly, sir.
translation.zh: 再来点香槟 宝贝 好的 先生

translation.en: Tucker, are you sure you don't want a shandy or something?
translation.zh: 塔克 你确定不来点香蒂酒之类吗？

translation.en: I've got to finish this mission report, sir.
translation.zh: 我得完成任务报告呢 长官

translation.en: And Pegasus wants to see us as soon as we touch down.
translation.zh: 我们一着陆 帕加索斯就要见我们
我们一着陆 帕加索斯就要见我们 任务报告

translation.en: Come on, Tucker. Live a little.
translation.zh: 别写了 塔克 人生苦短啊

translation.en: You should learn to savor success.

translation.zh: 痛快玩乐 不是吗… 芭芭拉

translation.en: for years I believed what happened in Mozambique was my fault.
translation.zh: 多年来 我一直认为 莫桑比克的事是我的过错

translation.en: Now I realize it was only partly my fault.
translation.zh: 现在我知道不全是这样
在莫桑比克到底发生了什么？

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. We're coming in to land.
translation.zh: 打扰了 先生 就要着陆了

translation.en: Can I stow that overhead for you? Certainly.
translation.zh: 我帮您放到架子上好吗？ 当然

translation.en: Sir, I don't think he's a "Susan."
translation.zh: 长官 我觉得 他的名字应该不是“苏珊”

translation.en: But then you're not a linguist, are you, Tucker?
translation.zh: 你不是语言学家吧 塔克

translation.en: From the Xinzhou region, unless I'm very much mistaken.
translation.zh: 来自忻州地区 除非是我搞错了

translation.en: I hope you've got something for us, English.
translation.zh: 希望你有所收获 英格力士

translation.en: The prime minister is extremely concerned.
[ JOHNNY ] He has every reason to be so.
There is a plot to kill the Chinese premier...
translation.zh: 有人密谋杀害中国总理

translation.en: masterminded by a group of ruthless assassins called Vortex.
translation.zh: 有人密谋杀害中国总理 策划者是一群 残忍的杀手组成的旋风组
残忍的杀手组成的旋风组 天啊

translation.en: The danger, however, has been averted...
- English? - Now, I know what you're going to say.
translation.zh: 英格力士 我知道你要说什么

translation.en: Well, it's often the little things that pack the biggest punch.
translation.zh: 世事往往是四两拨千斤
世事往往是四两拨千斤 -正如 -长官

translation.en: David killed Goliath with a pebble.
translation.zh: 大卫用卵石杀了哥利亚

translation.en: The mighty Vortex has been slain by my possession...
translation.zh: 当我拥有了这把小巧钥匙时 强大的旋风组已经被扼杀了
强大的旋风组已经被扼杀了

translation.en: We got it, but Fisher talked.
translation.zh: 拿到钥匙了 可费舍尔泄密了
明白 我们会干掉英格力士

translation.en: You've got some more cleaning to do.

translation.zh: 妈妈 大黄先生来了

translation.en: Why don't you show him into the conservatory?
translation.zh: 伊兹 亲爱的 要不把他带暖房里去

translation.en: I'll be with you in just a minute. Okay. Come on! Let's go!
translation.zh: 我等会就来陪你 好的 快点 快走
-你带路吧？ -快点 大黄先生

translation.en: Perhaps when you've found your key, you'll give me a call.
translation.zh: -你带路吧？ -快点 大黄先生 等你找到你的钥匙 给我打个电话

translation.en: I'm very sorry, Foreign Secretary. I'd hoped to have more for you.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 外长先生 本来想能给您带来更多好信息

translation.en: Clearly there has been a misunderstanding. Oh, God.

translation.zh: 帕加索斯 我抓到她了

translation.en: She was in Hong Kong! She's the killer!
translation.zh: 英格力士 她就是在香港的那个杀手

translation.en: Mummy! Mummy, are you all right?
[ PANTING ] Should we get you a cup of tea?
I think a cup of tea, that's what's required.
translation.zh: 按她说的 上杯茶吧

translation.en: Pegasus, I am truly, truly sorry.
translation.zh: 帕加索斯 真的很抱歉

translation.en: Don't apologize to me. Apologize to her.
translation.zh: 别跟我道歉 跟她说去

translation.en: It was a simple case of mistaken identity, I'm afraid.
Now, I completely understand how upset you are,
translation.zh: 现在 我完全明白 你很生气

translation.en: but I was hoping perhaps if we could talk--
That's her! It's the killer from Hong Kong!
translation.zh: 塔克 是她 香港的杀手

translation.en: No, it's not her, sir. It is! This time it's really her!
translation.zh: 不 不是她 长官 是她 绝对是

translation.en: - It's not her, sir! - Yes, it is!
- Take that and that! - [ CHILDREN SCREAMING ]
[ GAGGING ] I've got her this time, Pegasus!
translation.zh: 这次抓住她了 帕加索斯

translation.en: This is the witch who works for Vortex! [ WHIMPERING ]
translation.zh: 她就是为旋风组服务的女巫

translation.en: Want any more, you old hag?
You humiliate me in front of the foreign secretary,
translation.zh: 你在外交部长面前羞辱我

translation.en: you lose our only lead on Vortex,
translation.zh: 弄丢了旋风组唯一的线索

translation.en: and then you try and kill my mother!

translation.zh: 帕加索斯 我们另有线索

translation.en: They were responsible for the death of President Chambal!
translation.zh: 他们应该对昌巴尔总统的死负责

translation.en: No! You were responsible for the death of President Chambal.
translation.zh: 他们应该对昌巴尔总统的死负责 不 你才该对昌巴尔总统的死负责

translation.en: Well, you certainly gave Mr. Rhubarb a run for his money.
translation.zh: 你完全抢了小丑先生的风头

translation.en: Still, at least we know Vortex was in Mozambique.
translation.zh: 不过 至少我们知道 旋风组当时就在莫桑比克

translation.en: When you told Pegasus, you displayed all four indicators...
translation.zh: 当你告诉帕加索斯的时候 表现出了说实话的四大特征
表现出了说实话的四大特征

translation.en: [ KATE ] This is a facial action coding system.
translation.zh: （镜头4 左侧） （镜头5 面部） 这是个面部动作编码系统 （面部数据）
它的高速摄像镜头可以捕捉到

translation.en: It detects what we call "emotional leakage."
translation.zh: 探察到所谓的情感泄露

translation.en: Uh, Ms. Sumner, I'm a trained agent.
translation.zh: 萨姆纳女士 我是训练有素的特工
我是训练有素的特工 我什么都不会泄露

translation.en: I want to take you back to Mozambique.
translation.zh: 我想让你重返莫桑比克

translation.en: - Take a look at this. - [ CHIMING ]
[ KATE ] I want to take you back to Mozambique.
translation.zh: 我想让你重返莫桑比克

translation.en: I'm taking a risk being here after hours.
translation.zh: 非工作时间来这 我可是冒了险的

translation.en: If Vortex was in Mozambique, perhaps you saw something.
translation.zh: 如果旋风组当时在莫桑比克 你可能看到了些什么

translation.en: I'm going to take you back there using hypnosis.
translation.zh: 我会通过催眠让你回到当时的场景

translation.en: Oh, please. Spare me the New Age mumbo jumbo.
translation.zh: 饶了我吧 你可以省了这些时髦把戏

translation.en: Mr. English, please. I'm a professional.
translation.zh: 英格力士先生 拜托 我是专业人士

translation.en: I'm not going to just snap my fingers-- Mmm.
translation.zh: 我是专业人士 我不会随便打个响指

translation.en: and make you say the first thing that comes into your head.
translation.zh: 让你说出映入脑海的第一件事物
聪慧的头脑 美丽的面庞

translation.en: And completely out of my league.
I'd like to take you back to Mozambique. ♪ [ DRUMMING ]
translation.zh: 我现在要你回到莫桑比克
说说你看到了什么 约翰尼
昌巴尔总统的就职大典

translation.en: Yes. You are head of security.
translation.zh: 没错 你是安保负责人
今天 我们勇攀高峰

translation.en: The people have spoken, and the message is clear.
translation.zh: 群众的呼声 我都听到了

translation.en: The backup electrical supply has been cut.
translation.zh: 一个崭新的和平繁荣之邦 备用电源被切断了

translation.en: No, it hasn't. It's been turned off.
translation.zh: 没有切断 只是被关闭了

translation.en: Do you know how to turn it on?
translation.zh: 那你知道 怎么打开你的开关吗？

translation.en: Well, operations like this are always difficult.
translation.zh: 这种任务总是相当棘手

translation.en: But it's very satisfying when you get a result.
translation.zh: 不过圆满完成后 我还是深感欣慰

translation.en: The president couldn't be in safer hands.
translation.zh: 保护总统 舍我其谁

translation.en: The sound of freedom and celebration.
translation.zh: 庆祝自由与欢呼喝彩之音
别紧张 约翰尼 放松 回想一下

translation.en: Before the Jacuzzi, what did you see?
translation.zh: 在洗按摩浴之前 你还看到了什么？

translation.en: On the terrace with two others.
translation.zh: 和另外两个人在露台上

translation.en: [ KATE ] Yes. All three members of Vortex were there that day.
translation.zh: 是的 旋风组的三名成员那天都在场

translation.en: Who can you see? Who can you see, Johnny?
translation.zh: 约翰尼 你看到谁了？都有谁？
阿提姆卡尔兰科 双重间谍
阿提姆卡尔兰科 双重间谍 曾受雇于莫斯科的军情七处

translation.en: Retired after his penchant for killing people threatened his cover.
translation.zh: 对于可能暴露他身份的人 都格杀勿论 因此被遣退

translation.en: Five years ago, he turned up here as Sergei Pudovkin.
translation.zh: 因此被遣退 五年前 他在这里现身 化名谢尔盖普多夫金
他是个富豪 很有钱

translation.en: A member of the exclusive Oakwood Golf Club,
translation.zh: 是奥克伍德 顶级高尔夫俱乐部的会员

translation.en: which is where you'll be meeting him.
translation.zh: 是奥克伍德 顶级高尔夫俱乐部的会员 你就在那儿跟他见面

translation.en: He's in a match play competition, sir.
translation.zh: 他在那里参加比洞赛 长官

translation.en: I'm making you his opponent for the day.
translation.zh: 我会把你设为他今天的比赛对手

translation.en: Done it, sir. You're booked in as Mr. Peter Adams.
translation.zh: （彼特亚当斯 对战 谢尔盖普多夫金） 搞定 你将化身 彼特亚当斯先生参加比赛

translation.en: If Karlenko is Vortex, I want you to bring him in... alive.
translation.zh: 如果卡尔兰科是旋风组的一员 把他给我带回来 要活的

translation.en: Pudovkin. And you must be Mr., um--
translation.zh: 是普多夫金 那你一定就是
车很棒 亚当斯先生

translation.en: - [ WOMAN'S VOICE ] Ready, sir. - Thank you.
translation.zh: 准备就绪 长官 多谢夸奖

translation.en: So, what line of business are you in, Mr. Adams?
translation.zh: 那你从事什么行业呢 亚当斯先生？

translation.en: I'm Mr. Adams, and you're Mr.--
translation.zh: 抱歉 没错 我才叫亚当斯 你叫…

translation.en: uh, whoever you said you were.
Oh. Sorry. I thought I'd forgotten something. Mmm.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我以为自己忘了东西

translation.en: I may not know much about golf, Tucker,
translation.zh: 塔克 虽然我不是 打高尔夫的行家

translation.en: but I know how to hold the bat.
So, what line of business are you in, Mr. Puddykin?
translation.zh: 你做哪一行生意呢 普地精先生？

translation.en: I made my money in the removals business. Ah.
A friend of mine had shares in a removals business.
translation.zh: 我有个朋友也做拆迁买卖

translation.en: Titus Fisher. You haven't come across him at all?
translation.zh: 他叫提图斯费舍尔 你跟他有来往吗？

translation.en: I warn you, Mr. Adams, not to stray into the rough.
translation.zh: 我可警告你 亚当斯先生 别趟这浑水

translation.en: You get in there, you might never come out.
translation.zh: 因为一旦陷进去 可能就出不来了

translation.en: I'll bear that in mind, Mr. Puddykin.
translation.zh: 谨记在心 普地精先生
我叫普多夫金 别再叫错了

translation.en: As was my friend Fisher, actually.
translation.zh: 事实上就跟我的朋友费舍尔一样

translation.en: By his cleaner, of all people.
translation.zh: 偏偏还是他的清洁工干的

translation.en: Break left to right, I think.
translation.zh: 赛点 我觉得可以从左往右打

translation.en: He can't die. He mustn't die.
translation.zh: 天啊 他不能死 绝对不能

translation.en: Let's get him out of here. Come on! [ GROANING ] Come on, hurry!
translation.zh: 带他离开这儿 快点
长官 他看起来不妙

translation.en: [ LOUDLY ] We're getting you to a doctor.
translation.zh: 长官 他看起来不妙 我们带你去医院 你会没事的
我们带你去医院 你会没事的

translation.en: You do know how to fly these, sir?
translation.zh: 你会开这玩意儿吧 长官？

translation.en: It was part of basic training. Good.
It's just like riding a bike.
Yes. It's all coming back to me.

translation.zh: 这里是祖鲁祖鲁探戈 高尔夫酒店的直升机

translation.en: We have a casualty onboard. Request guidance to nearest hospital.
translation.zh: 机上有一位伤员 请指示最近的医院地址
请说你们的具体位置 位置 我们的位置

translation.en: Uh-- She shot out the navigation system.
translation.zh: 位置 我们的位置 她打坏了导航系统

translation.en: [ MAN ON RADIO ] What's our altitude? What's our altitude?
translation.zh: 飞行高度是多少？ 飞行高度吗？

translation.en: We'll have to stick to the road.
Let's follow the 1328. There's bound to be a hospital in Dingham.
translation.zh: 就走1328道吧 鼎汉一定有医院

translation.en: - [ PUDOVKIN GROANING ] - Look after him, Tucker. Look after him.
translation.zh: 看看他 塔克 去看看他

translation.en: I think we're losing him, sir. We can't lose him, Tucker.
translation.zh: 我觉得他不行了 长官 不行也得行 塔克

translation.en: He's our only lead. Try something else.
translation.zh: 他是我们唯一的线索 再想别的辙

translation.en: ♪ Don't give up on us, baby ♪
translation.zh: 不要就此放弃 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Lord knows we've come this far ♪
translation.zh: 上帝知道一路走来的疲惫

translation.en: [ MUMBLES ] ♪ Stay the way we are ♪
♪ Don't give up on us I know ♪
translation.zh: 不要就此放弃 我相信

translation.en: ♪ Bom, We could still come through ♪
translation.zh: 我们定会战胜困难与艰辛

translation.en: [ TUCKER ] Look, sir! Follow that ambulance!
translation.zh: 看啊 长官 跟着那辆急救车
旋风组的成员 一个是克格勃的

translation.en: There's a mole and a vole?
translation.zh: 有个内魂还有个内鬼吗？

translation.en: No, sir. There's-- There's a mole, not a vole.
translation.zh: 不是的 长官 有一个内鬼 不是内魂

translation.en: Well, I disagree. There's certainly a vole.
translation.zh: 我不同意 肯定有个内魂

translation.en: I mean, we know that much.
translation.zh: 证据确凿 毋庸置疑

translation.en: But what you're saying is there might be a mole as well.
translation.zh: 但你刚刚说可能还有个内鬼

translation.en: There's a meeting at MI7 with the prime minister.
translation.zh: 首相要来军情七处开会

translation.en: And here again, eyes down and to the left, indicating dissent.
translation.zh: （军情七处总部 1012室） 再看这里 眼神向下再向左 表示不同意

translation.en: With Xiang Ping, it's all about the eyes. Thank you, Ms. Sumner.
translation.zh: 通过向平的眼睛 便知道他的内心活动 谢谢 萨姆纳女士

translation.en: If the talks go ahead, I'd like you with us.
translation.zh: 谢谢 萨姆纳女士 如果会晤继续的话 希望你也能出席
你好 英格力士先生 你好 萨姆纳女士

translation.en: So, when is the prime minister going to grace us with his presence?
translation.zh: 那咱们的首相大人 要何时大驾光临呢？

translation.en: Um, all right. So we're all here.
These talks with China are of paramount importance.
translation.zh: 这次与中国首脑的会晤非常重要

translation.en: Rogue states in Southeast Asia have begun secretly to develop nuclear weapons.
translation.zh: 这次与中国首脑的会晤非常重要 东南亚那些蛮夷 已经在秘密开发核武器

translation.en: It is vital that we get China onside.
translation.zh: 所以 与中国达成共识很关键

translation.en: Traditionally, China has been impervious to our concerns,
translation.zh: 一般而言 中国不会支持我们的观点

translation.en: but I believe Xiang Ping, given the opportunity,
translation.zh: 但我相信 要是时机恰当

translation.en: can and will help defuse this situation.
translation.zh: 向平有能力 并愿意协助我们解除危机

translation.en: [ FOREIGN SECRETARY ] Well, with his pro-West stance,
translation.zh: 鉴于他对西方的友好态度

translation.en: The talks can't go ahead unless we can guarantee his safety.
translation.zh: 但要保证他的安全 这次会晤才能继续

translation.en: I believe, with the correct security, that we can.
translation.zh: 但要保证他的安全 这次会晤才能继续 我认为 安保得当就没问题

translation.en: If Vortex is operational, it's just too dangerous.
translation.zh: 如果旋风组在密谋行动 那就很危险了

translation.en: I'm inclined to agree, Prime Minister.
The Swiss are willing to lend us Le Bastion.
translation.zh: 瑞士政府同意把空中堡垒借给我们

translation.en: That's their government fortress in the Alps.
translation.zh: 那是他们在阿尔卑斯山脉的军事要塞

translation.en: It's a stunning example of architectural engineering at altitude...
translation.zh: 一座非常优秀的高地工事

translation.en: I mean, that should solve all our security issues.
translation.zh: 这样就能解决我们的安全问题

translation.en: Pamela, I hope you've brushed up on your Mandarin.
translation.zh: 帕姆拉 我希望你多温习普通话

translation.en: I'd like you in the room with me,
translation.zh: 到时你和这里最好的特工

translation.en: and your best man on security.
translation.zh: 到时你和这里最好的特工 会紧随我左右
旋风组这边调查得怎么样了？
英格力士 旋风组是个三人组

translation.en: Fisher was one, Karlenko was another.
translation.zh: 一个是费舍尔 一个是卡尔兰科

translation.en: Karlenko was killed today on the orders of the third.
translation.zh: 而卡尔兰科 今天被那第三个人杀害了
有 但需要时间调查

translation.en: We need to know the identity of the third person in Vortex.
translation.zh: 我们需要知道旋风组 第三名成员的身份

translation.en: Of course. And would you like to choose dessert? Yes. You.
translation.zh: 没问题 您需要什么甜点吗？ 是的 就点你这甜心

translation.en: So, come on, Johnny. What was it you wanted to ask me?
translation.zh: 说吧 约翰尼 你想问我什么？

translation.en: Simon, do you know what this is?
translation.zh: 西蒙 你知道这是什么吗？

translation.en: Karlenko and Fisher both had one,
translation.zh: 卡尔兰科和费舍尔各有一把

translation.en: and they were both killed for them.
give it to the boys at the lab and see--
translation.zh: 那我拿去 给实验室的哥们看看再…

translation.en: Karlenko told me that the third man in Vortex...
translation.zh: 卡尔兰科告诉我 第三个人就在军情七处内部
第三个人就在军情七处内部

translation.en: Simon, I have to ask you a question...
translation.zh: 西蒙 我必须要当着你的面问清楚
我必须要当着你的面问清楚

translation.en: Do you have any idea who it might be?
translation.zh: 你觉得这个人会是谁呢？

translation.en: [ CHUCKLING ] Johnny. I thought you were about to accuse me.
translation.zh: 约翰尼 我还以为你在怀疑我呢

translation.en: Simon Ambrose, the evil mastermind! Don't. Stop it!
translation.zh: 什么？ 西蒙安布罗斯 邪恶的大反派 -快别说了 -我们中的大叛徒

translation.en: A traitor in our midst! You! You!
translation.zh: -快别说了 -我们中的大叛徒 你啊

translation.en: Oh! Simon, you are so funny.
Would you excuse me for one moment, Simon?
translation.zh: （塔克：快来洗手间 十万火急） 不好意思 失陪一下 西蒙
长官 塔克 你就不能等等吗？

translation.en: Yes, I know it's Ambrose. I'm having dinner with him.
translation.zh: 是啊 我知道是安布罗斯 我正和他吃饭呢

translation.en: No, he's the third man in Vortex.
translation.zh: 不是 他就是旋风组的第三个人
他可是伊顿公学的高材生
-你这是干什… -过去 -好 -快点 过去

translation.en: You said you never knew Karlenko.
translation.zh: 你说你根本不认识卡尔兰科

translation.en: Then how do you explain these?
translation.zh: 那你如何解释这张照片？
我潜入了卡尔兰科的计算机
这是你们俩在莫桑比克吧

translation.en: Sometimes I have trouble myself, old boy. [ CHUCKLES ]
translation.zh: 我有时也不能淋漓尽致 老兄

translation.en: You're Vortex. You're the third man in Vortex.
translation.zh: 你就是旋风组的 你是旋风组的第三个人

translation.en: [ URINATING ] Sorry. I'll be with you in just a tick.
It's true. I was in Mozambique.
translation.zh: 没错 我当时在莫桑比克

translation.en: I was there because of Patch Quartermain.
translation.zh: 但我是因为帕奇柯特蒙才去的

translation.en: Patch? Oh. Sorry. I'll just be one second.
translation.zh: 帕奇吗 抱歉 马上就好

translation.en: He's the man you're after. [ ZIPPER ZIPS ]
I work for a secret organization inside MI7...
translation.zh: 军情七处为了逮捕他 专门建了个秘密组织

translation.en: set up specifically to bring him in.

translation.zh: 秘密组织里的秘密组织吗？
是吗？那这个组织叫什么？

translation.en: A secret, secret Secret Service called Armitage?
translation.zh: 一个叫阿米蒂奇的秘密行动组织

translation.en: We answer only to the P.M.
That you'd think for one moment...
that I would fall for such a steaming pile...
translation.zh: 我会相信你 这套不靠谱的胡诌乱扯吗？
这套不靠谱的胡诌乱扯吗？

translation.en: Well done, Tucker. You're not Spy of the Month for nothing.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 塔克 果真是本月特工之星

translation.en: Thank you, sir. Here, let me take that.
translation.zh: 果真是本月特工之星 谢谢夸奖 长官 来 把枪给我
你才是胡诌乱扯的那个

translation.en: You're in way over your head, boy. Now run along.
translation.zh: 你脑子里真是团浆糊 孩子 快走吧

translation.en: No! I won't go, sir. He's lying.
translation.zh: 不 我不走 长官 他在撒谎

translation.en: You've let me down, you've let the service down,
translation.zh: 我对你很失望 军情处对你很失望

translation.en: and, frankly, I think you've let yourself down.
translation.zh: 军情处对你很失望 说实话 你也应该对自己感到失望
帕奇柯特蒙 怎么会是他呢？

translation.en: Blowing his own legs off? Now that's what I call deep cover.
translation.zh: 他炸掉了自己的双腿吗？ 这就是我说的深藏不露

translation.en: And to think how much I admired him.
He thinks you're a moron with no place in MI7.
translation.zh: 他觉得你就是个自大的无名小卒
蠢蛋一个 根本不配待在军情七处

translation.en: That's why he tried to destroy you.
just because he ruined your life,
translation.zh: 千万不要因为他毁了你的生活

translation.en: that's no reason for you to go rogue and take him down on your own.
translation.zh: 你就失去理智 单枪匹马地去找他算账

translation.en: God forbid I should put a crazy idea like that in your head.
translation.zh: 你就失去理智 单枪匹马地去找他算账 我真不应该跟你说这番话

translation.en: That key you showed me-- We might need it to bring him in.
translation.zh: 约翰尼 我们可能需要 拿刚才那把钥匙去逮捕他

translation.en: Arrange a meeting with our client. Of course.
translation.zh: 给我们和客户安排一个会议 好的

translation.en: It's all over for you now, English.
translation.zh: 都结束了 英格力士

translation.en: It's the end of the line.
Yes, you'd like that, wouldn't you, Patch?
translation.zh: 是啊 你当然希望如此 是不是 帕奇？

translation.en: After all, I'm just a jumped-up grammar school nobody, aren't I?
translation.zh: 毕竟我就是个自大的无名小卒而已

translation.en: [ CHUCKLES ] What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 毕竟我就是个自大的无名小卒而已 你在说什么呢？

translation.en: I know that you are the third man in Vortex.
translation.zh: 你在说什么呢？ 我知道你就是 旋风组的第三名成员
不 约翰尼 你才是

translation.en: You've lost him! I don't believe it.
translation.zh: 这都能跟丢 难以置信

translation.en: Oi! Who do you think you are?
translation.zh: 嘿 你以为你是谁啊？

translation.en: [ AGENT ON SPEAKER ] Agent English, pull over! Pull over!
translation.zh: 特工英格力士 停车 快停车
凯特 我不是旋风组的 我被陷害了
我不是旋风组的 我被陷害了
五亿美元 我们说好的

translation.en: You're lucky it was just a flesh wound.
Look. I'm going to Switzerland tonight, but you can stay here while I'm gone.
translation.zh: 听着 我今晚要去瑞士 我走了你可以待在这

translation.en: I've been going through the news footage from the night Chambal was killed. Ah.
translation.zh: 我在查看 昌巴尔遇刺那晚的监控录像

translation.en: Seconds after President Chambal was shot,
translation.zh: 昌巴尔总统被刺之后的片刻

translation.en: - [ GROANS ] - And the autopsy says heart failure.
But-- [ MUTTERING ] if you go through the classified CCTV footage--
translation.zh: 但如果你看一下 内部闭路电视画面
行刺的十五分钟前 他开始狂躁

translation.en: He's completely lost control of his body.
translation.zh: 他完全控制不了自己的身体
然后 突然像是紧张性神经分裂症

translation.en: I don't think he had any idea what he was doing.
translation.zh: 我觉得他压根不知道自己在做什么
我想旋风组的秘密武器
就是一种能控制思维的药

translation.en: And only one fits the symptoms.
translation.zh: 只有一种药符合以上症状
地莫克西…地莫克西林巴巴
地莫克西林巴伯布特纳

translation.en: The C.I.A. ordered its destruction 10 years ago.
translation.zh: 中情局十年前命令将其销毁

translation.en: And the agent in charge of its disposal--
translation.zh: 中情局十年前命令将其销毁 负责处置它的特工是

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么感谢你

translation.en: So, Johnny, what are you going to do about Vortex?
translation.zh: 约翰尼 你打算怎么对付旋风组？

translation.en: If only Simon was here. He'd know what to do.
translation.zh: 不知道啊 如果西蒙在就有办法了

translation.en: Why do you think he's better than you?
translation.zh: 你为什么觉得他比你强？

translation.en: Come-- Well, the man's a god.

translation.zh: 单纯又难以捉摸 让人疯狂的凡人

translation.en: I've come to realize that what's really exciting to me...
translation.zh: 我才发现最让我心潮澎湃的
是绝对的忠诚 决心

translation.en: You have always fascinated me... clinically.
translation.zh: 你总是让我神魂颠倒 正中下怀

translation.en: Ms. Sumner, your pupils are dilating.
translation.zh: 萨姆纳女士 你瞳孔在扩大
我觉得理性已经阻止不了我们了

translation.en: Are you ready? I'll drive you to the airport.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？ 我送你去机场

translation.en: Oh, how nice. I'll just get my bag.
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？ 我送你去机场 真贴心 我去拿包

translation.en: [ WHISPERING ] Should I-- Are you alone?

translation.zh: 别 当然 在工作呢

translation.en: Been brushing up on the Chinese P.M. You?
translation.zh: 准备一下中国总理的资料 你呢？

translation.en: Oh, we're trying to track down Johnny English.
translation.zh: 我们在追捕约翰尼英格力士

translation.en: There are some questions we want to ask him... about Vortex.
translation.zh: 关于旋风组我们有些事想问他

translation.en: I don't suppose you've seen him, have you? No.
translation.zh: 我猜你没看见他吧 对吗？ 对啊

translation.en: Not my type. [ CHUCKLES ] Shall we?
translation.zh: 不是我的行事作风 走吧

translation.en: There's a Mr. Adams to see you, Colin.
translation.zh: 科林 有位亚当斯先生要见你

translation.en: Hello, Tucker. What are you doing here?
Every agent in the country's after you.

translation.zh: 我们怀疑安布罗斯是对的

translation.en: If we act fast, we can-- You wouldn't listen, would you?
translation.zh: 如果咱够快 还能… 你能听句劝吗？

translation.en: You think you know it all. Well, you don't!
translation.zh: 你自以为什么都知道 狗屁

translation.en: Being an agent means everything to me.
And, thanks to you, I'm suspended!
translation.zh: 多亏你 我被停职了

translation.en: Would you boys like some orange squash?
No, thank you. No, thanks, Mum.
translation.zh: -不用 谢谢 -免了 老妈
塔克 安布罗斯在瑞士

translation.en: I am here because my country needs me.
translation.zh: 我来这儿 是因为国家需要我

translation.en: And because it needs you too.
Set the sat nav for Switzerland. Let's kick some bottom.
translation.zh: 导航系统锁定瑞士 咱们起飞

translation.en: [ ROYCE ] You have arrived at your destination.
One way up, one way down.
[ JOHNNY ] Come on. Let's get the stuff.
Whoa, look. The T2 ground-to-air missile.
Take it from me, Tucker. I was working with these
translation.zh: 好好学学 塔克 我玩这些的时候 你还不知道在哪儿捏泥巴呢
我玩这些的时候 你还不知道在哪儿捏泥巴呢

translation.en: The D-16 ascender, and up we go.
Are you sure that's the ascender, sir?
Yes, yes. I'd know it anywhere.
[ MALE VOICE ] Agent in distress. Agent in distress.
Agent in distress. Agent in distress.
Dear God, let me not die at the hands of the Swiss.
translation.zh: 我的天哪 别让我死在瑞士佬手里
塔克 听着 你来打我

translation.en: I want you to attack me. What?
translation.zh: 塔克 听着 你来打我 -什么？ -一番争斗之后

translation.en: After a struggle, you can "arrest me"...
translation.zh: -什么？ -一番争斗之后 你可以逮捕我

translation.en: and take me inside as your prisoner.
Sir, I can't. Tucker, that's an order.
I see how people get the taste for this.
translation.zh: 看来还真有人有这癖好

translation.en: I've got a better idea! I'll shoot you!
translation.zh: 我有个更好的主意 我朝你开枪
去死吧 旋风组的人渣

translation.en: The glass can withstand mortar attack.
The door is one-way. You can get out, but no one gets in.
translation.zh: 门能从里面反锁 你能出来 但没人进得去
你能出来 但没人进得去 好极了

translation.en: I'll, uh, have them send refreshments to your room...
translation.zh: 帕加索斯 你准备好了
帕加索斯 你准备好了 我就让他们把饮料给你送进去
我就让他们把饮料给你送进去 谢谢你 一号特工

translation.en: I'll take it from here, boys.
translation.zh: 弟兄们 我来接手吧

translation.en: Let me see your I.D. Um--
[ JOHNNY WHISPERS ] Excuse me. What the--
Warning: This is a designated conflict zone.
translation.zh: 看好了 这里是格斗区

translation.en: [ PEGASUS ] Thank you so much. You're welcome, Pegasus.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 不客气 帕加索斯

translation.en: They're going to make you kill Xiang Ping!

translation.zh: 一号特工 谢天谢地

translation.en: He's the third member of Vortex.
translation.zh: 他是旋风组的第三个人

translation.en: Here to give you some Timoxy Bubby--
translation.zh: 他来是给你 地莫克西…巴巴…

translation.en: that will make you obey his every command.

translation.zh: 我倒很想看看 西蒙

translation.en: How exactly were you going to administer it?
Some hideous gas through the air vents?

translation.zh: 地莫克西林巴伯布特纳

translation.en: He'll enter the manic phase any moment now.
translation.zh: 他现在随时有可能进入癫狂状态

translation.en: [ CHUCKLES ] I have to warn you...
that I've been trained to resist this kind of thing.
translation.zh: 我对抵御这类事情可是千锤百炼
一号特工 什么情况？

translation.en: Oh, he's quite harmless at this phase.

translation.zh: 他会被毒死 不过在那之前

translation.en: But just before it does, there will be a short window...
translation.zh: 他会被毒死 不过在那之前 有一小段空档

translation.en: where he'll do everything I tell him to.
You were never really MI7, Johnny.
translation.zh: 可怜的约翰尼 你从来都不属于军情七处

translation.en: You were never really one of us.
And now you're about to become our most famous agent.
translation.zh: 而你现在却要成为最有名的特工了

translation.en: You'll now do exactly as I tell you.
translation.zh: 现在我说什么你做什么

translation.en: You are a traitor to the service and to your country.
translation.zh: 现在我说什么你做什么 你是组织和国家的叛徒

translation.en: Okay, Slater. Let's get him ready.
translation.zh: 斯莱特 让他做好准备

translation.en: Premier Ping, it's a pleasure to finally meet you.
translation.zh: 总理 能得相见 不胜荣幸

translation.en: You had a pleasant flight, I trust?
[ OVER SPEAKER ] I was just asking the premier if he had a pleasant flight.
translation.zh: 我只是问总理他旅途是否顺利

translation.en: Kate, Johnny's back on the team. What?
translation.zh: 凯特 约翰尼回归组织了

translation.en: It's all checked out, and the P.M. and the Chinese have approved it.
translation.zh: 什么？ 查出来了 首相和中国方面也证实了

translation.en: Approved what? He's standing in for Pamela.
translation.zh: 首相和中国方面也证实了 -证实什么？ -他来顶替帕姆拉
打扰一下 塔克特工

translation.en: [ PRIME MINISTER ] Good. Good. And your wife is well?
Premier, I am most grateful you have agreed to meet me at this time.
translation.zh: 总理 我很感谢您能在 这个时候同我见面

translation.en: It is our pleasure. [ SPEAKING CHINESE ]

translation.zh: 保持这种语调 首相
避免对抗 保持眼神交流

translation.en: I can assure you that the Chinese people...
translation.zh: 我可以向你保证中国人民

translation.en: have always regarded the British people...
translation.zh: 我可以向你保证中国人民 一向认为贵国人民
一向认为贵国人民 十分神经

translation.en: I was very keen to meet.
Johnny, stand up and go to the water table.
translation.zh: 约翰尼 站起来 走到饮品桌边上
总理 我相信只要及时行动起来

translation.en: present danger can be averted if we act swiftly.
translation.zh: 总理 我相信只要及时行动起来 当下的危险是可以避免的
这是为帕加索斯设计的

translation.en: Well, it's too bloody late now.

translation.zh: 首相 传统意义上讲…

translation.en: China does not respond well to advice--
Now, Johnny, I want you to kill Xiang Ping.
translation.zh: 约翰尼 现在我让你杀掉向平

translation.en: He's being controlled. [ FOREIGN SECRETARY ] By who?
Mind... must be master of the body.
His left hand is fighting the right hand.
[ TUCKER ] If I can interrupt the frequency,
translation.zh: 如果我能打乱频率的话

translation.en: I could stop Ambrose from communicating with him. Ah!
translation.zh: 就能阻止安布罗斯跟他说话

translation.en: He'll be dead in 50 seconds, sir.
translation.zh: 五十秒后他就死了 长官

translation.en: Listen to me. This is Simon Ambrose.
translation.zh: 听着 我是西蒙安布罗斯

translation.en: [ OVER SPEAKER ] I order you to shoot Xiang Ping!
Time to get out of here.
- His pulse is dropping. - Don't lose him.
translation.zh: 脉搏越来越弱了 别放弃他

translation.en: [ TIBETAN TEACHER ] Open your heart, English,
translation.zh: 敞开心扉 英格力士

translation.en: I won't kiss you, if you don't mind.
translation.zh: 不介意的话我就不跟你亲了

translation.en: Sir? What are you doing, sir?
Guideline 17-5. Never question a senior agent in the field.
translation.zh: 行规17章第五条 别对老特工问这问那
安布罗斯 你个十足的人渣
约翰尼 蛋还不够疼吗？

translation.en: You can betray your country, you can cheat your friends,
translation.zh: 你可以背叛祖国 出卖朋友

translation.en: but you can't get away from Johnny Eng--
translation.zh: 但你不能逃脱 约翰尼英格力士的法…
他还活着 合上啊 合上

translation.en: [ PRIME MINISTER ] I couldn't be more delighted.
and China has expressed its gratitude to both Britain and the service.
translation.zh: 而中国政府也表达了 对英国和组织的感谢

translation.en: We owe English a great deal.
translation.zh: 对英国和组织的感谢 我们得好好谢谢英格力士

translation.en: Well, reinstating his knighthood is a truly lovely gesture.
translation.zh: 恢复他的骑士荣誉是个积极的表示

translation.en: And it'll mean the world to him.
translation.zh: 对他本人也是无上光荣

translation.en: Her Majesty will be with him shortly.
Got you! You old hag! [ SHRIEKING ]
[ JOHNNY ] I've just about had enough of you, you old cow!
translation.zh: 受够了 你个老妖精
看你还往哪儿跑 帕加索斯
英格力士 就是她 就是那个清洁工杀手
就是她 就是那个清洁工杀手

translation.en: You never know when it's over, do you?

translation.zh: 看你还跑 跑 跑啊 跑

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么感谢你
